name: Violetta
description:
Violetta is a 4 year-old Mixed Breed (likely German Shepherd and Doberman mix) Female.

A ferocious guard dog serving under Violet, one of the leaders of the Fiends. Violetta is fed a specialized diet of human flesh and turbo, making her exceptionally aggressive and dangerous.

Violetta's Personality: Aggressive, territorial, and fiercely loyal to Violet. She views outsiders with suspicion and hostility.

Violetta's Backstory: Violetta was found as a stray pup by Violet in the ruins of Las Vegas. Recognizing her aggressive potential, Violet took her in and personally trained her as a guard and attack dog. Over time, Violetta became completely loyal to her owner, developing a taste for the same diet as her captor. She now serves as Violet's most trusted and feared companion, guarding the trailer compound with lethal efficiency.
